sentences.english: Erythromycin and tylosin were widely used in veterinary.
sentences.chinese: 獸醫臨牀最常用的是紅黴素和泰樂菌素。

sentences.english: But Roxithromycin sustained release pellets with smaller size show a better bioavailability.
sentences.chinese: 但小粒徑羅紅黴素緩釋微丸具有更高的生物利用度。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the antibacterial effects in vitro and protective effects in vivo of Roxithromycin dry suspension.
sentences.chinese: 研究羅紅黴素幹混懸劑體外抗菌作用及體內保護作用。

sentences.english: Compond Erythromycin Alcohol Solution Set in the Content Side Crythyomycin.
sentences.chinese: 測定複方紅黴素醇溶液中紅黴素含量。

sentences.english: Compond Erythromycin Alcohol Solution Set in the Content Side Crythyomycin.
sentences.chinese: 測定複方紅黴素醇溶液中紅黴素含量。

sentences.english: Specific examples include erythromycin and enterobactin biosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 特例包括紅黴素和腸菌素的生物合成。

sentences.english: It was far more active than ofloxacin and erythromycin.
sentences.chinese: 抗菌活性明顯高於氧氟沙星和紅黴素。

sentences.english: In fact, this is eczema, with erythromycin eye ointment applied twice.
sentences.chinese: 其實這是溼疹，用紅黴素眼膏塗抹兩次即可。

sentences.english: Objective To develop a UV method for the determination of roxithromycin .
sentences.chinese: 目的採用紫外分光光度法測定羅紅黴素膠囊的含量。

sentences.english: Others are sources of antibiotics such as streptomycin and erythromycin.
sentences.chinese: 還有一些細菌是鏈黴素或紅黴素等抗生素的來源。

sentences.english: Objective Screening Streptomyces erthreus antiphage strain.
sentences.chinese: 目的篩選紅黴素鏈黴菌抗噬菌體菌株。

sentences.english: You say the elder brother treat rhinitis to use be convenient to use of erythromycin eye ointment?
sentences.chinese: 哥哥你說的治鼻炎用紅黴素眼藥膏好使嗎？

sentences.english: Aim To establish water determination by Fischers method in erythromycin estolate granules.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討依託紅黴素顆粒水分的費休氏法測定。

sentences.english: For example amoxicillin, streptomycin and erythromycin.
sentences.chinese: 例如阿莫西林，鏈黴素，紅黴素。

sentences.english: Verapamil and erythromycin could reverse the MDR of leukemic cells.
sentences.chinese: 異搏定和紅黴素對白血病細胞MDR有逆轉作用。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the formulation of enteric coating of erythromycin.
sentences.chinese: 目的優化紅黴素腸溶薄膜包衣配方。

definition: to desensitize/to remove an allergic susceptibility
to claw wildly/to scratch frantically/to arrest people indiscriminately
